definition: plate/dish/tray/board/hard drive (computing)/to build/to coil/to check/to examine/to transfer (property)/to make over/classifier for food: dish, helping/to coil/classifier for coils of wire/classifier for games of chess

sentences.english: With records at home, listeners imitated these lighting effects as best they could.
sentences.chinese: 家里有了唱盘，听众尽力模仿舞厅灯光效果。

sentences.english: I need a case to keep my compact discs.
sentences.chinese: 我需要一个盒子装我的激光唱盘。

sentences.english: I have more CDs than Harry.
sentences.chinese: 我比哈里有更多的激光唱盘。

sentences.english: Edison's phonograph is the distant ancestor of today's CD player.
sentences.chinese: 爱迪生的留声机是今日CD唱盘的老祖宗。

sentences.english: You shouldn't play with the CDs.
Place a record on the turntable mat.
sentences.chinese: 把想播放的唱片放到唱盘垫上。

sentences.english: Also released was the first in a three-part collected series of double compact disc sets.
sentences.chinese: 同时发行的还有三部专集系列第一部的两张激光唱盘。

definition: sound/acoustics/audio/hi-fi system/stereo sound system/abbr. for 組合音響|组合音响[zu3 he2 yin1 xiang3]
loudspeaker box/speaker (audio equipment)/resonating chamber of a musical instrument/sound box
